sourcesContent:
Test component

Hello, World

import { Component, Input, OnChanges, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ templateUrl: './testing.component.html', selector: 'test-component' }) export class TestingComponent implements OnInit { show = false; toggleShow(event: any) { console.log("toggleShow"); var button: HTMLButtonElement = event.srcElement; button.textContent = "Clicked!"; this.show = !this.show; } ngOnInit() { console.log("Init fired"); } }
